TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BluetoothAdapter extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the local device Bluetooth adapter.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Intent used to broadcast the change in connection state of the local Bluetooth adapter to a profile of the remote device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The local Bluetooth adapter has finished the device discovery process.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The local Bluetooth adapter has started the remote device discovery process.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The local Bluetooth adapter has changed its friendly Bluetooth name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Activity Action: Show a system activity that requests discoverable mode.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Activity Action: Show a system activity that allows the user to turn on Bluetooth.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Indicates the Bluetooth scan mode of the local Adapter has changed.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The state of the local Bluetooth adapter has been changed.

Docs.summary: Returns the hardware address of the local Bluetooth adapter.

Docs.summary: Returns a object for Bluetooth LE Advertising operations.

Docs.summary: Returns a object for Bluetooth LE scan operations.

Extra used by
This extra represents the current connection state.

Docs.summary: Used as an optional int extra field in intents to request a specific duration for discoverability in seconds.

Extra used by
